definition: and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly

sentences.english: Hopes of a peace settlement faded.
sentences.chinese: 和平解決的希望成爲泡影。

sentences.english: We have consistently called for settling international disputes by peaceful means and opposed the use of force.
sentences.chinese: 我們一貫主張和平解決國際爭端，反對使用武力。

sentences.english: We believe that it is up to the people on both sides of the Strait to resolve their differences peacefully.
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲要由海峽兩岸人民和平解決他們的分歧。

sentences.english: What are the prospects foreseen by China for the peace-talk process and the peaceful resolution of the issue?
sentences.chinese: 對和談進程及和平解決核問題的前景怎麼看？

sentences.english: All hopes of a peaceful settlement were destroyed by the bomb.
sentences.chinese: 這個爆炸事件使一切和平解決的希望都破滅了。

sentences.english: And there is still long way to go before the issue is ultimately resolved peacefully.
sentences.chinese: 最終和平解決朝核問題還有很長的一段路要走。

sentences.english: Third, , uphold mutual understanding and mutual accommodation and peaceful settlement of disputes through dialogue and consultation.
sentences.chinese: 第三，互諒互讓，堅持對話協商和平解決爭議。

sentences.english: always upholds a peaceful settlement of the Iranian nuclear issue through dialogue and negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 中方一貫主張通過對話與談判和平解決伊朗核問題。

sentences.english: We only "export" peace and cooperation and are committed to peaceful solution of international disputes and hotspot issues.
sentences.chinese: 我們致力於和平解決國際爭端和熱點問題。

sentences.english: It urged all sides to peacefully resolve existing problems through dialogue.
sentences.chinese: 該組織敦促各方通過對話和平解決現存的問題。

sentences.english: I have only requested the League of Nations, taking into account justice and peaceful resolution.
sentences.chinese: 我考慮到只有請國際聯盟主持正義，和平解決。

sentences.english: Within Israel, there is very little pressure for a peace settlement.
sentences.chinese: 在以色列內部，幾乎沒有和平解決的壓力。

sentences.english: The question of the peace settlement is likely to prominently in the talks.
sentences.chinese: 和平解決的問題很可能是這次談判的突出重點。
